verbs.description: [ARG0: sf supervisor mandelman] [V: wants] [ARG1: more care facilities approved more quickly] [ARGM-PRP: in an attempt to provide seniors and the disabled with more places to live] san francisco supervisor rafael mandelman introduced legislation tuesday that would make it easier to open new residential care facilities increasing services for the homeless mentally ill and disabled is a top priority for mandelman whose mother suffered from severe mental illness he and his team spent the past two months touring mental health facilities shelters and nonprofits around the city during these tours he said he learned that the city has a shocking number of seniors and people with disabilities or severe illnesses living in our shelters without a guaranteed path to housing supervisor reporter rafael mandelman board of supervisor mandelman san francisco chronicle city hall san francisco trisha thadani san franciscans

sf supervisor mandelman wants [ARG1: more care facilities] [V: approved] [ARGM-MNR: more quickly] [ARGM-PRP: in an attempt to provide seniors and the disabled with more places to live] san francisco supervisor rafael mandelman introduced legislation tuesday that would make it easier to open new residential care facilities increasing services for the homeless mentally ill and disabled is a top priority for mandelman whose mother suffered from severe mental illness he and his team spent the past two months touring mental health facilities shelters and nonprofits around the city during these tours he said he learned that the city has a shocking number of seniors and people with disabilities or severe illnesses living in our shelters without a guaranteed path to housing supervisor reporter rafael mandelman board of supervisor mandelman san francisco chronicle city hall san francisco trisha thadani san franciscans
